title: Any tips for a beginner Zac?
body:
So i'm starting to play Zac alot more now; Tried him in a Nemesis Draft game earlier and i did horribly ( http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78911860/200415394?tab=overview )
Any tips? I'd like him to become one of my mains; Might not put as many hours into him as my current main, Gangplank though but i'd still like a champ to resort to when Gangplank is banned.

replies.body: The first thing you must do is choose from his many skins ;)

You don't. He was strong before jungle got buffed, but now he barely survives killing his second buff. 

Nautilus, Sejuani and Sion do his job better. Unless you are talking about top lane, in which case he is still an OK pick.
inb4 BluFire? or is he not here anymore (like moi)

I played him once and carried.

I rushed spirit visage and put first point in w for heals and maxed q first.

Then the game was over and I was 8/0 or something.

Hopefully someone with more experience replies coz idk

Simple, you don't play Zac.


I'm so smart.

Hes in a weak spot atm, he doesnt have a huge amount of cc, nor huge tankiness, nor much damage. So hes in a weird spot. If you get a decent lead you should be fine its just he doesn't offer a lot. Its also tricky in the fact that riot based him around his chunks that fall off him when he casts, and its not really viable for him to run around a teamfight getting his chunks, so hes not viable much at all :(. But if you push ahead of the pack you should be fine, his E his a great ganking tool too!
